description: A humorous take on lacking courage
title: Patio Plan
n_1: Alex and Jamie stood in their backyard.
c1_1: I'm thinking of building a patio.
c2_1: Do you even have the materials?
c1_3: Well, I don't have the stones.
n_4: They both laughed, the plan set aside.
c2_4: Sure, if you find the stones.
